name: Saint Hell
description:
Saint Hell is a 2D RPG in which you will need to choose the side of angels or demons and lead them to victory.
In this game, you choose the side for which you would like to complete the game.You will have to complete various quests, travel to various locations, fight monsters, search for different treasure chests, study magic and buy equipment to become stronger.After all, it depends only on you whether the forces of light will win or the whole world will turn into hell.
Key Features :

- Open world.

- The ability to choose the side of Angels or Demons.

- Non-linear history.

- Multiple endings.
